remarks: The meet of a collection of equivalence classes of covers with respect to fineness.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 5-Oct-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)
statement:
fnemeet1 $p |- ( ( X e. V /\ A. y e. S X = U. y /\ A e. S ) -> ( ~P X i^i |^|_ t e. S ( topGen ` t ) ) Fne A ) $.
$d A t y $.
$d S t y $.
$d V t $.
$d X t y $.
